meanings.definition: Send (a letter or package) by airmail.
meanings.sent1: I will be airmailing the important documents to you tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She always prefers airmailing gifts to her family overseas.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried airmailing itself in a tiny box to its friend across the country.
meanings.sent4: His words were airmailing comfort and reassurance to her troubled heart.
meanings.sent5: The sun airmailing warmth to the earth on a bright morning is a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: The system of sending mail by aircraft.
meanings.sent1: The airmailing of letters has made communication faster and more efficient.
meanings.sent2: Airmailing is crucial for delivering urgent packages to remote areas.
meanings.sent3: The airmailing service had a special team of flying squirrels to assist with deliveries.
meanings.sent4: In times of need, airmailing becomes the superhero of the postal world.
meanings.sent5: The airmailing of love letters across continents keeps romance alive in a digital age.
